summary: This document consists of four daily lieutenant's log entries from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York for July 27-28, 2019. The logs detail routine operations, counts, and incidents, with specific notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch/psych observation with an inmate companion. The logs also note a fight between two other inmates and that Epstein was at a local hospital with USMS guards.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054, noted as being on suicide watch/psych observation with an inmate companion and at a local hospital with USMS guards.

persons.name: Carrillo
persons.context: Inmate #86996-054 placed in Administrative Detention at 1:35 AM on July 28, 2019, pending an SIS investigation.

persons.name: Lane
persons.context: Inmate #86357-054 involved in a fight in unit GS at 9:05 PM on July 27, 2019, and placed in Administrative Detention.

connections.description: The log notes Epstein was on psych observation/suicide watch 'w/inmate companion'.
Both inmates were involved in a fight in unit GS on the evening of July 27, 2019, and were subsequently placed in Administrative Detention.

events.title: Epstein placed on suicide watch
events.description: Log entry for the Evening Watch on July 27, 2019, notes 'I/M Epstein #76318-054 on Suicide Watch. w/inmate companion'.

events.title: Inmate fight in unit GS
events.description: An unwitnessed fight occurred in unit GS at 9:05 PM. Inmates Lane and Fuentes were involved, an EMT was called, and both inmates were placed in Administrative Detention.

events.title: Eppson at local hospital
events.description: Multiple log entries note that inmate Epstein was at a local hospital or nursing facility with USMS guards and on psych observation.

events.title: Inmate Carrillo placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Inmate Carrillo (#86996-054) was placed in Administrative Detention at 1:35 AM pending an SIS investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on suicide watch/psych observation with an inmate companion on July 27-28, 2019, while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Epstein was noted as being at a local hospital (and also referenced at Goldcrest nursing facility and Brooklyn Hospital) with USMS guards during this period.
The correctional facility's fire alarm and sprinkler systems were non-operational, requiring a fire watch to be in progress.
A fight between two other inmates, Lane and Fuentes, occurred on the evening of July 27, 2019, in unit GS, resulting in EMT response and both being placed in Administrative Detention.
The logs show routine institutional counts and security checks, with notations for WITSEC inquiries and monitored phone calls for STG/High Alert inmates.
